sub_title: Global Planning Senior Lead - Supply Chain Enthusiast - Industrial Engineer & MBA
summary:
Highly skilled Industrial Engineer & MBA specializing in Logistics and International Purchases with 9 years of impactful experience in operations, projects, and strategic decision-making. 
As Global Planning Senior Lead at Heineken, I drive Digital Transformation in Demand Planning and S&OP/IBP.

Key Achievements:
- Global ownership of Demand Planning capability. 
- Successful implementation of best-in-class S&OP processes, including Blue Yonder deployments across multiple countries. (SPAIN, USA, RUSSIA, BRAZIL, MEXICO)
- Passionate trainer and Agile implementer. 
- Proven expertise in Business Process Optimization, reducing non-value tasks, optimizing inventory, and increasing service levels. 

Key Capabilities: 
- Responsibility-driven 
- Versatile with a strong aptitude for teamwork 
- Proactive communicator, eager to learn and improve 
- Adaptable to new tools and environments 
- Committed to professional growth 
- Skilled in leading business transformations and managing complex challenges 
- Change agent for delivering impactful outcomes. 
- Lifelong learner with a willingness to relocate.

treasury_media.title: Somos HEINEKEN
treasury_media.description: Descubre cómo llevamos creando redes sociales desde 1864, comenzando en una pequeña cervecería en Amsterdam hasta ser la cervecera más internacional del mundo con más de 250 marcas en 70 países.

awards.title: Supply Chain Recognition
awards.description:
Por haber hecho posible llevar a cabo la automatización de dos procesos dentro del planning diario de Central Planning, MP Output de Escandinavia e Inventory Models de Proveedores.
Los dos procesos aumentaron la visibilidad a la hora del planning, facilitando tomar decisiones con más rapidez y exactitud.
Estos procesos se pudieron hacer gracias al trabajo en equipo con Supply Chain de Alemania y Sourcing, donde Manuel demostró una gran destreza en esta competencia y a la vez proporcionó valor añadido a dichos procesos, aumentado los niveles de satisfacción del cliente interno.

projects.title: Estudio internacional de diseño y viabilidad de medidas de ahorro energético y de agua en vivienda industrializada.

profile_positions.description:
I am responsible for overseeing worldwide demand planning and creating and managing the demand planning capability roadmap to shape the future and overcome existing capability gaps.

Key responsibilities include:

- Determining the technology, processes, and skills necessary to achieve best-in-class results in demand planning
- Driving new development projects and ideas that have the potential to become future capabilities
- Conducting internal and external benchmarking initiatives with a continuous improvement mindset
- Serving as a planning expert and translator between business needs, processes, and technology
- Providing support and governance on capability knowledge management, including process, trainings, materials, and KPIs

Skills : Leadership, responsibility, stakeholders management, demand planning, S&OP, and innovation. 
Achievements: Definition of Demand Planning transformation roadmap.
profile_positions.title: Global Planning Senior Lead - Demand Planning Capability

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading and conducting S&OP projects focused on Demand Planning and Fulfillment. 
Together with Blue Yonder I implemented solutions based on statistical and Machine Learning models.

- Heineken USA (2020) - Statistical forecasting + Fulfillment
- Heineken Russia (2021-2022) - Machine Learning forecasting + Fulfillment
- Heineken Brazil (2021-2022) - Machine Learning forecasting
- Heineken Mexico (2022-2023) - Machine Learning forecasting

My goal is to deliver a Demand Planning and Flowcasting/Fulfillment solutions in collaboration with Blue Yonder to help Operating Companies to move forward their planning processes.

Key responsibilities:
-	Support transition between AS IS and TO BE processes
-	Ensuring horizontal expansion of best practices from other Operation Companies/Countries
-	Guide the Operating Company during the project. Change management.
-	Functional design – Design based on Capability fundamentals and best practices.
-	Key Users and End Users trainings – On site and online trainings.

Skills: Leadership, Project management, Technology, Demand Planning, Fulfillment, Training
Achievements: Successful implementations in Heineken USA, Russia, Brazil, and Mexico.
profile_positions.title: Global Deployment Lead Demand & Fulfillment Planning [ Statistics & Machine Learning based ]

profile_positions.description:
-	Demand forecast for Heineken Group brands. (370 items, + 1000 DFU’s)
-	After 4 years planning based on SAP APO DP I was leading the change to JDA/Blue Yonder as part of S&OP Global Project were I was responsible for defining business requirements and lead the local implementation.
-	Demand Segmentation and Root cause analysis (5W)
-	S&OP meetings – Leading Demand Review Meetings
-	Total Productive Maintenance (TPM) 
Skills: Operations, Demand Planning, SAP APO, Blue Yonder, Stakeholders management, Training
Achievements: TOP 3 FA in Europe. Selected as trainer to other European Demand Planners
profile_positions.title: Senior Demand Planner – JDA/Blue Yonder Key User

profile_positions.description:
Heineken is a world leader in Cider Business.
-	Definition and coordination of the processes related to Logistics, Production and Customer Service for Cider Business when Heineken Spain launched Cider in the end of 2017.

-	Responsible for:
o	International Logistics – Bulk tanks from Belgium
o	Inventory Management and Demand Forecasting
o	Coordination between Customer Service, Production Team and Engineering
o	S&OP Europe Meetings

-	Responsible for reporting progress and performance to Management Team bi-weekly.

Skills: Leadership, Supply Chain E2E, International knowledge transfer.
Achievements: First Agile Supply Chain project
profile_positions.title: Customer Service & Logistictics Responsible for Cider Business - Project Leader Role

profile_positions.description:
-	Production Plan of Madrid Brewery (90 sku's and 5 production lines).

-	OPI optimization, capacity, beer availability, packaging materials and RPM.

-	SAP APO - SNP CTM.

Skills: Supply Chain E2E, people management
Achievements: New scheduling tool design and implementation based on Excel
profile_positions.title: Production Planner - Madrid Brewery - Supply Chain / Customer Service & Logistics

profile_positions.description:
-	Responsible for Import Brands Planning:

o	Stock Planning: SAP APO - SNP 
o	Purchase Order Management: SAP PH1
o	Collaborative planning and cost saving with our main European suppliers Diageo, Paulaner, Alken Maes, Heineken UK, Heineken Italia, Heineken France... 
o	Direct to customer shipments

-	INCOTERMs use.

Skills: Supply Chain E2E, International logistics, Purchasing, INCOTERMS, Inventory management
Achievements: Business Process Optimization of Import Brands Planning and new SAP APO SNP planning book development in order to reduce Non-Value added task (-14h/week), to optimize the stock level (- 3 DoS) and increase the Service level (+1.2%)

-	Total Productive Maintenance (TPM)

Skills: Demand Planning, Continuous Improvement, Statistics
Achievements: Forecast accuracy increase +8%

profile_positions.description:

Inside the Central Planning, my tasks were to minimize the Supply Chain costs through the periodic Supply Chain optimization process via balancing stocks between countries and manage cost reduction opportunities across the whole Supply Chain network.

Skills: Demand Planning, Inventory optimization, international logistics
Achievements: Promotion from intern to Planning analyst in 4 months
